void Media::GetFrameRate (  UINT16 &  frame_rate_numerator,
UINT16 &  frame_rate_denominator
)  [virtual]
 

Returns the frame rate. Actual frame rate (in frames/sec) is calculated as frame_rate_numerator/frame_rate_denominator.

Parameters:
frame_rate_numerator On return it contains the frame rate numerator.
frame_rate_denominator On return it contains the frame rate denominator.
